org.fluidity.foundation.spi

Interface LogAdapter.Levels

  • Enclosing class:
    LogAdapter<L,T>

    public static interface LogAdapter.Levels
    Queries the various log levels. Subclasses of LogAdapter provide an implementation of this interface to show how to query the various log levels in the adapted logging framework.

    Usage

    See LogAdapter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean debug()
      Returns true if debug level logging is enabled, false otherwise.
      boolean info()
      Returns true if info level logging is enabled, false otherwise.
      boolean trace()
      Returns true if trace level logging is enabled, false otherwise.
      boolean warning()
      Returns true if warning level logging is enabled, false otherwise.
